pr_title: Updated External Lib Apache Poi build process

timeline.message:
Adjusted build process for apache poi - (Task #614)

- Chanegd apache poi to download dependencies from maven

---
Task #614: Update maven based library process for apache based plugins

timeline.bodyText: We probably don't need to explicitly list all jars
timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,8 +1,16 @@
 source.. = src/
 output.. = target/classes/
 bin.includes = META-INF/,\
-               .,\
                about.html,\
                about_files/,\
-               externalLib/
+               externalLib/,\
+               pom.xml,\
+               externalLib/maven/commons-codec.jar,\

replies.bodyText: Correct, we can try to just sue the folder once we update the versions
replies.author: PhilMFischer

timeline.author: andriikovalov-dlr
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -2,265 +2,8 @@
 <?NLS TYPE="org.eclipse.help.toc"?><toc label="VirSat Core API JavaDoc Compilation">
 <topic href="help/api-docs/javadoc/overview-summary.html" label="VirSat Core API JavaDoc Compilation">
 <topic label="Packages">
-<topic href="help/api-docs/javadoc/com/github/cliftonlabs/json_simple/package-summary.html" label="com.github.cliftonlabs.json_simple"/>

replies.bodyText: Not an issue, the api_docs.xml gets regenerated by the maven build process when creating the java docs
replies.author: PhilMFischer
